item.title: This Website
item.author: jaedon@jacobi.io (Jaedon Jacobi)
item.description: Attribution jacobi.io was created with: the Hugo static site generator; using a custom theme based on hello-friend-ng EB Garamond, Inconsolata, and Raleway from Google Fonts icons from Font Awesome the Flickity carousel library History This is the second incarnation of the jacobi.io website, redesigned in 2022 into a Hugo-powered static site.
